changelog: v5.4.0: Premium animation overhaul — cache bust for updated SVGs/logos, branding consistency across all assets

v5.3.0: SEO & accessibility optimization — full FAQ structured data (18 questions), hreflang tags for DE aliases, breadcrumb JSON-LD on all subpages, FAQ keyboard accessibility (role=button, aria-expanded), 404 page now uses shared.css/js with OG tags and skip-link, accessibility.html SVG titles for screen readers, Impressum skip-link in German
v5.2.0: Custom 404 page, proper 404 handling, version sync, reduced CSS duplication
v5.1.0: Performance optimization — self-hosted fonts, desktop nav on all pages, cache-first strategy
v5.0.0: Complete redesign — Liquid Glass + Bio-Green + Vaporwave identity
New color system: Bio-Green (#22C55E), Emerald (#10B981), Mint (#34D399)
Typography: Atkinson Hyperlegible font for accessibility and VR readability
Glass morphism cards with backdrop-filter blur throughout
Persona section: SVG icons replace emojis, concise descriptions
Hero text tightened for impact: 'Biology into art'
Scroll behavior fix: scroll-padding-top for fixed nav
Desktop nav with inline links and green CTA button
All sub-pages updated with consistent Bio-Green design tokens
Favicon, OG image, and app icon updated to bio-green palette
Service worker cache bumped to v5.0.0
Reduced color palette: green spectrum primary, rose/sky/violet accents
Feature section bullet tags with semantic color coding
Background shifted from #050510 to #030712 (matching app bgDeep)
